title: KSCCF Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 34 Sales Assistant, Pharmacist Posts
description: The Karnataka State Cooperative Consumer Federation Limited (KSCCF) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 34Â Pharmacist, First Division Assistant, and Sales Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, D. Pharm, and 12th can apply for the KSCCF Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have...
